name: Zippo
description:
Speedrun to get the best time you can on each stage. Optimize your route to get faster and unlock more skins, but be careful to not punch your monitor out of pure rage.


- Zip to the end goal fast and then even faster in this retro style speedrun action game.





- Unlock various skins and particle effects by getting faster times and less deaths.





- Mix and match these skins and particles to fit your own design taste.





- 6 Stages, featuring 60 levels to learn and improve your skills.
